children.value: There are several plugins in G6 which can be used for G6's graph or other applications.
Instantiate the plugin and configure the minimap onto the instance of Graph:
// Configure Grid and Minimap to the graph
Grid plugin draws grids on the canvas.
to instantiate grid plugin with the following configurations.
base64 formatted string for the grid image
Minimap is a tool for quick preview and exploration on large graph.
It can be configured to adjust the styles and functions.
The DOM container of Minimap. The plugin will generate a new one if
The className of the DOM element of the Minimap
The className of the DOM element of the view port on the Minimap
: Render all the graphics shapes on the graph;
: Only render the keyShape of the items on the graph to reach better performance;
: Only render the delegate of the items on the graph to reach better performance. Performance:
. The style of the delegate of the items on the graph
In complex graph with large number of edges, edge bundling can help you to improve the visual clutter.
Edge bundling on American airline graph.
The edge bundling plugin can be configured to adjust the styles and functions.
The initial number of division on each edge. It will be multipled by
The rate of the divisions increasement. Large number means smoother result, but the performance will be worse when the number is too large
The initial number of inner interations. It will be multiplied by
The rate of the iterations decreasement
The edge similarity threshold for bundling. Large number means the edges in one bundle have smaller similarity, in other words, more edges in one bundle
Menu is used to configure the right-click menu on the node.
the class name of the menu dom
the menu content，supports DOM or string
(target: HTMLElement, item: Item, graph?: IGraph) => void
the callback function when click the menu
Whether allow the tooltip show up. You can return true or false according to the content of the
the offset of tooltip along x axis, the padding of the parent container should be take into consider
the offset of tooltip along y axis, the padding of the parent container should be take into consider
the item types that allow the tooltip show up. e.g. if you only want the node tooltip, set the
Use G6 build-in menu by default.
ToolBar has the following operations by default:
The container of the ToolBar. It will take use the DOM of the canvas by default
The class name of the sub DOM nodes of the ToolBar
The callback functions for the icons of the ToolBar
ToolBar provides some default operations above.
The built-in TimeBar plugin has the following abilities:
Filtering the data of the graph by changing the time range;
Demonstrating the trending of the data by an attribute on the TimeBar.
It is a beta version of TimeBar, which will support complex time series graph and analysis in the future.
The container of the TimeBar. A DOM container with className 'g6-component-timebar' will be used by default
The width of the TimeBar's container
The height of the TimeBar's container
(graph: IGraph, min: number, max: number) => void
The callback function after changing the time range
The begining x of the TimeBar
The begining y of the TimeBar
The background style of the TimeBar
The foreground style of the TimeBar, which indicates the selected area
The style of the slider handler
The minimum position for the slider on the left, range from 0 to 1
The maximum position for the slider on the right, range from 0 to 1
The initial start position of the slider
The initial end position of the slider
The text for the minimum value
The text for the maximum value
The configuration of the trend chart on the TimeBar
Whether use the smooth curve instead of polylines for the trend chart
Whether use the area chart instead of line chart
The style of the line for line chart, takes effect when
The style of the area for area chart, takes effect when
It is free to configure the style for the TimeBar, and listen to the value changing to do some response.
ToolTip helps user to explore detail infomations on the node and edge. Do note that, This Tooltip Plugins will replace the tooltip in the built-in behavior after G6 4.0.
Tge class name of the tooltip's container
The container of the Tooltip. The canvas DOM will be used by default
Whether allow the tooltip show up. You can return true or false according to the content of the
the offset of tooltip along x axis, the padding of the parent container should be take into consider
the offset of tooltip along y axis, the padding of the parent container should be take into consider
the item types that allow the tooltip show up. e.g. if you only want the node tooltip, set the
The content of the Tooltip is the type and id of the item by default. Users are free to custom the content of the Tooltip by configuring
Fisheye is designed for focus_context exploration, it keeps the context and the relationships between context and the focus while magnifing the focus area.
Magnify coefficient. Larger the value, larger the focus area will be magnified
The radius of the focus area
The style of the lens's delegate
If the label is hidden, whether to show the label of nodes inside the focus area
The maximum radius scaled by the wheel
The minimum radius scaled by the wheel
, minimap allow users to adjust the magnifying coefficient
by dragging left / right on the lens.
is the maximum magnifying coefficient that limits this interaction. The suggested range for
is [0, 5]. Note that updating the configurations by
, minimap allow users to adjust the magnifying coefficient
by dragging left / right on the lens.
is the minimum magnifying coefficient that limits this interaction. The suggested range for
is [0, 5]. Note that updating the configurations by
The trigger for end users to scale the range of the lens
The trigger for end users to scale the magnification factor of the lens
Whether show the percent of current magnification factor on the bottom of the lens, where the percent is about the D, minD, and maxD
Update partial of the configurations of the fisheye instance, including
Edge Filter Lens is designed for edge filtering, the desired edges will be kept inside the lens while the others will be hidden.
Simple filtering conditions related to the end nodes.
: show the edge whose one or more end nodes are inside the filter lens;
: show the edge whose both end nodes are inside the lens;
: show the edge whose source node is inside the lens and target node is not;
: show the edge whose target node is inside the lens and source node is not. More complicated conditions can be defined by the
The custom conditions for filtering. The parameter
is the data of each edge, you can return boolean value according to the data, where
The radius of the filter area
The style of the lens's delegate
If the label is hidden, whether to show the label of nodes inside the focus area
The maximum radius scaled by the wheel
The minimum radius scaled by the wheel
The trigger for end users to scale the range of the lens
Update partial of the configurations of the filter lens instance, including
